name: Gmail
description: Gmail connector allows you to send and access e-mail messages which are in your Gmail mailbox. The connector uses the standard IMAP and SMTP protocols with the extensions provided by Google to provide a more Gmail-like experience.

params.name: subject
params.description: (Optional) Subject of the e-mail message

params.name: messageBody
params.description: (Optional) Text content of the mail

params.name: from
params.description: Sender's email address.

params.name: to
params.description: A comma separated list of recipients

params.name: cc
params.description: A comma separated list of cc recipients

params.name: bcc
params.description: A comma separated list of bcc recipients

params.name: fileName
params.description: (Optional) A comma separated list of content IDs (should be same as the file names) of attachments

params.name: filePath
params.description: (Optional) A comma separated list of file paths

params.name: responseVariable
params.description: Name of the variable to which the output of the operation should be assigned.

params.name: overwriteBody
params.description: Replace the Message Body in Message Context with the output of the operation (This will remove the payload from the above variable).

params.name: id
params.description: ID of the label to delete

params.description: Name of the variable to which the output of the operation should be assigned

params.name: overwriteBody
params.description: Replace the Message Body in Message Context with the output of the operation (This will remove the payload from the above variable).

params.name: to

params.name: bcc

params.name: messageBody

params.name: threadId

params.name: connectionName
params.description: The name for the email connection

params.name: clientId
params.description: Client ID used to connect with the mail server

params.name: clientSecret
params.description: Client Secret to connect with the mail server

params.name: refreshToken
params.description: Refresh Token used to connect with the mail server

params.name: apiUrl
params.description: API URL used to connect with the mail server

params.name: apiVersion
params.description: API Version used to connect with the mail server

params.name: userId
params.description: User ID used to connect with the mail server

params.name: tokenEndpoint
params.description: Token URL used to connect with the mail server

operations.name: Read Mail
operations.description: Read a mail by it's Id

operations.name: Trash Message
operations.description: Moves the email to Trash. It can be recovered within 30 days.

operations.name: Delete Message
operations.description: Permanently deletes the email. This cannot be undone.

operations.name: End Session
operations.description: Terminate the existing IMAP and SMTP connections with Gmail

operations.name: Delete Label
operations.description: Permanently deletes the label. This cannot be undone.

operations.name: Trash Thread
operations.description: Moves the email thread to Trash. It can be recovered within 30 days.

operations.name: Read Mail
operations.description: Read a mail by it's Id

operations.name: Password Login
operations.description: Login to the Gmail account using username and password

operations.name: End Session
operations.description: Terminate the existing IMAP and SMTP connections with Gmail

operations.name: Init
operations.description: get the basic details of api

operations.name: Get Access Token From Refresh Token
operations.description: get the access token from refresh token

operations.name: passwordLogin
